mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT PRO.* FROM TBL_PROGRAM PRO JOIN TBL_PROGRAM_TAGS PRO_TAG ON PRO.idx = PRO_TAG.pro_idx JOIN TBL_TAGS TAG ON PRO_TAG.tag_idx = TAG.idx WHERE 1=1
AND TAG.name IN
#{tag}
AND NOW() > end_tm
AND NOW() BETWEEN start_tm AND end_tm
order by ${UP} asc
order by ${DOWN} desc
order by CREATE_TM desc
LIMIT ${LIMIT} OFFSET ${OFFSET}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PROGRAM( TITLE , IMAGE , OPERATE , TARGET , PLACE , PHONE , START_TM , END_TM , EXPLAN , CONTENT , CREATE_TM , UPDATE_TM ) VALUES(#{title} , #{image} , #{operate} , #{target} , #{place} , #{phone} , #{start_tm} , #{end_tm} , #{explan} , #{content} , now() , now() )
mapper.update:
UPDATE TBL_PROGRAM SET TITLE = #{title} ,
IMAGE = #{image},
OPERATE = #{operate},
START_TM = #{start_tm},
END_TM = #{end_tm},
EXPLAN = #{explan},
CONTENT = #{content},
TARGET = #{target},
PLACE = #{place},
PHONE = #{phone},
UPDATE_TM = now() WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT PRO_TAG.idx , PRO_TAG.pro_idx , PRO_TAG.tag_idx , TAG.name FROM TBL_PROGRAM_TAGS PRO_TAG JOIN TBL_TAGS TAG ON PRO_TAG.tag_idx = TAG.idx WHERE PRO_TAG.pro_idx = #{idx} ORDER BY TAG.name
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_TAGS SET `GROUP` = #{group} , NAME = #{name} WHERE IDX = #{idx}
